sentences.sentence: 18-hour cities combine the best of 24-hour and 9-5 cities, which contributes to downtown revitalization.
sentences.translation: 十八小时城市结合了二十四小时城市和朝九晚五城市的优势，促使了城市中心的复苏。

sentences.sentence: We will continue to promote restructuring and revitalization in key industries.
sentences.translation: 继续推进重点产业调整振兴。

sentences.sentence: I invite you to join me on this journey of reaffirmation, remembrance, reform, and revitalization!
sentences.translation: 请你们和我一起来重申、回顾、革新和重振旗鼓！
